channel.title: Good Java Books?
channel.description:
I'm quite "fluent" in Java (been learning it for about 8 months now), I've done everything from JFrames to Servlets to bot development to game design (a little). However, I may have forgotten a few things I need to brush up on (like polymorphism, recursion :| don't judge me :P). Does anyone recommend any good books that deal with these subjects and/or JSP, servlets and sockets? Thanks in advance? :D
inb4 http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

item.title: Good Java Books?
item.dc:creator: @Wyrmcabbage Wyrmcabbage

@Wyrmcabbage wrote:

I’m quite “fluent” in Java (been learning it for about 8 months now), I’ve done everything from JFrames to Servlets to bot development to game design (a little). However, I may have forgotten a few things I need to brush up on (like polymorphism, recursion don’t judge me :P). Does anyone recommend any good books that deal with these subjects and/or JSP, servlets and sockets? Thanks in advance?
